mapper.sql: /* menu-mapper.xml id="selectMenuSql" 메뉴 조회 sql */ SELECT tb1.seq , tb1.resource_id , tb1.resource_name , tb1.resource_pattren , tb1.resource_url , tb1.parents_resoruces_id , tb1.sort_no , tb1.use_yn , tb1.in_user , tb1.in_dtm , tb1.up_user , tb1.up_dtm FROM tbsy_menu tb1

/* menu-mapper.xml id="selectMenuSql" 메뉴 조회 sql */ SELECT tb1.seq , tb1.resource_id , tb1.resource_name , tb1.resource_pattren , tb1.resource_url , tb1.parents_resoruces_id , tb1.sort_no , tb1.use_yn , tb1.in_user , tb1.in_dtm , tb1.up_user , tb1.up_dtm FROM tbsy_menu tb1

WITH recursive hierarchy_cte AS (SELECT 1 AS level , tb1.parent_role_id /* 부모롤ID VARCHAR(50) */ , tb1.role_id /* 자식롤ID VARCHAR(50) */ , tb1.in_user_id , tb1.in_dtm , tb1.up_user_id , tb1.up_dtm FROM tbsy_roles_hierarchy tb1 WHERE tb1.delete_yn = 'N' AND tb1.role_id = #{role_id} UNION ALL SELECT level + 1 AS level , tb2.parent_role_id /* 자식롤ID VARCHAR(50) */ , tb2.role_id /* 부모롤ID VARCHAR(50) */ , tb2.in_user_id , tb2.in_dtm , tb2.up_user_id , tb2.up_dtm FROM tbsy_roles_hierarchy tb2 INNER JOIN hierarchy_cte tb3 ON tb2.parent_role_id = tb3.role_id )

WITH RECURSIVE menu_cte AS (SELECT 1 AS lv , tb1.sort_no AS sort_no , tb1.sort_no AS parents_sort_no , tb1.seq , tb1.menu_id , tb1.menu_type , tb1.menu_name , tb1.menu_img_file_seq , tb1.menu_pattren , tb1.menu_url , tb1.parents_menu_id , tb1.use_yn , tb1.in_user_id , tb1.in_dtm , tb1.up_user_id , tb1.up_dtm , tb1.delete_yn , tb1.de_user_id , tb1.de_dtm FROM tbsy_menu tb1 WHERE delete_yn = 'N' AND parents_menu_id = 'CM_000' UNION ALL SELECT lv + 1 AS lv , tb2.sort_no AS sort_no , tb3.sort_no AS parents_sort_no , tb2.seq , tb2.menu_id , tb2.menu_type , tb2.menu_name , tb2.menu_img_file_seq , tb2.menu_pattren , tb2.menu_url , tb2.parents_menu_id , tb2.use_yn , tb2.in_user_id , tb2.in_dtm , tb2.up_user_id , tb2.up_dtm , tb2.delete_yn , tb2.de_user_id , tb2.de_dtm FROM tbsy_menu tb2 JOIN menu_cte tb3 ON tb2.parents_menu_id = tb3.menu_id WHERE tb2.delete_yn = 'N')
